participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and cheerful, Emily enjoys outdoor activities and has a fondness for comfort food.
participant_1.background: i like to take walks. i have a boyfriend. i do not drink soda. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and determined, Jake is passionate about music despite facing challenges and works hard to support himself.
participant_2.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
